messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
Who is the forger that partly unraveled the binding of the Horror?
Cecil Hunter
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the Horror's location on its manifestations?
Its effect will be noticeably pronounced within a half mile or so of its location
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the nature of the binding that the Horror was under?
A binding of blood and ink within angles and lines upon the page
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the goal of the keepers creating their own manifestations of the Horror?
To create their own manifestations, using the following as guidance
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the current state of the Horror in relation to reality?
Now partly free
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the Horror's location on the surrounding area?
the effect will be noticeably pronounced
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the recommended approach for investigators to narrow down suspects and searches?
investigators might well use this fact to narrow down their suspects and searches
You are a helpful assistant.
Who may encounter the manifestations of the Horror?
Anyone who has touched the Witch Trial Papers
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the Witch Trial Papers on the environment?
The effect of the Witch Trial Papers on the environment includes T The Oncoming Storm, which causes radios, batteries, and electrical systems to suffer, and cars to stall.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who can create their own manifestations of the Witch Trial Papers?
Keepers are encouraged to create their own manifestations of the Witch Trial Papers, using the provided guidance.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to radios, batteries, and electrical systems during The Oncoming Storm?
Radios, batteries, and electrical systems suffer increasing disruption, fuses blow unexpectedly, and cars stall.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the suggested order of occurrence of the Witch Trial Papers' manifestations?
The manifestations are listed in a suggested order of occurrence, although the text does not specify the exact order.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of the suggested order of occurrence for the manifestations?
Anyone who has touched the Witch Trial Papers may encounter any or all of the manifestations.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Witch Fire manifestation characterized by?
Eerie reddish lights seen in the distance
You are a helpful assistant.
What may be reported at places of note during the Witch Fire manifestation?
Eerie reddish lights, and false fire reports to the authorities
You are a helpful assistant.
Where may the Witch Fire manifestation be reported?
Places such as the legendary Witch House of Keziah Mason, the Hobbhouse Manse, Hunter’s Studio, Leiter’s cottage, or anywhere else deemed appropriate by the Keeper.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the locations where Witch Fire may be reported?
places such as the legendary Witch House of Keziah Mason, the Hobbhouse Manse, Hunter’s Studio, Leiter’s cottage, or anywhere else deemed appropriate by the Keeper
You are a helpful assistant.
What effects may witnesses experience after seeing Witch Fire?
illness, fatigue, and headaches
You are a helpful assistant.
What disturbances may occur near those who have touched the papers?
disturbances near to those who have touched the papers, including a presence sensed nearby, footsteps sounding in the vacant room above, and telephones ringing with whispering voices
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when no one is present in a room after a disturbance?
someone enters the room, but when you turn there is no one there
You are a helpful assistant.
What symptoms can witnesses experience after interacting with the Horror?
illness, fatigue, and headaches
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a victim who has touched the papers after being possessed by the Horror?
They become open to possession by the Horror, allowing it to use its Soul Burn to attack others
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a corpse that has been possessed by the Horror?
It acts as a Zombie
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to witnesses who see a partial manifestation of the Horror?
They suffer a 1/1D4 SAN loss on their Sanity roll
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a corpse if it's possessed?
It acts as a Zombie.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will the Horror manifest as before fully manifesting into reality?
A trail of madness and death.
You are a helpful assistant.
How much SAN loss occurs from witnessing a partial manifestation of the Horror?
1/1D4 SAN loss.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be done to put an end to the Horror?
Taking the original illustrated portion of the Witch Trial Papers and putting them away from direct harm.
